        public boolean keyDown(int keycode)
        This will be called when a key is pressed down (keyboard) by libgdx's InputProcessor
        Specified by:
        keyDown in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Parameters:
        keycode - the key that was pressed down on the keyboard
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, this is used in the framework to toggle if it should propagate upwards thus we return false
